bif.title: Placeholder for Malamba, Hyperlinked Archival Research Tool
Placeholder for relevant pages from John Wright's annotated photocopies of James Stuart's handwritten notes pertaining to Malamba
Malamba, Testimony from 'The James Stuart Archive of Recorded Oral Evidence Relating to the History of the Zulu and Neighbouring Peoples', Volume 2 (Mab-Maz)
